full_summary:
=============

**Tender Announcement: Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) - Spares - Hardware**

**Reference:** cb-842-49507900
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249402/A

**Publication Date:** 2024-03-05
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-29T14:00:00

**Purpose:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of spares and hardware for Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW). The items required include various parts to be delivered to the Canadian Forces Supply Depots (CFSD) in Montreal and Edmonton.

**Specification:**

The solicitation includes the following items:

* Gaskets (Items 1 and 2)
* Bolts and Studs (Items 3 and 4)
* Switches and Accessories (Items 5 and 6)
* Valves and Valve Extensions (Items 7-10)
* screws, nuts, and washers (Items 11-14)
* bearings (Items 15-17)
* Hose Assemblies (Items 25 and 26)
* other miscellaneous hardware components (Items 27-44)

**Delivery:** The items are to be delivered within 120 calendar days of contract award. The delivery locations are the Canadian Forces Supply Depots (CFSD) in Montreal and Edmonton.

**Bid Submission:**

Bids must be submitted electronically to the following email address:

DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca

**Resolution Methods:**

* The contracting authority retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Note:**

* This tender is now closed.
* The solicitation uses the electronic submission of bids. Please refer to the solicitation document for details.

**Attachments:**

* Solicitation document (PDF)
* Amendment 004 (PDF)

**Contact Information:**

* Contact person: Yewon Pyeon (yewon.pyeon@forces.gc.ca)
* Contact phone: (000) 000-0000
